metadata.title: CVE-2016-3734 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in markposts.php in Moodle3.0 through 3.0.3, 2.9 through 2.9.5, 2.8 through 2.8.11, 2.7 through2.7.13 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication ofusers for requests that marks forum posts as read.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
